A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing in terms of story line and character development. Even musical score disappointing. Not inspiring or thrilling or meaningful enough. Luke was lame-not the same Luke. Cheap effects such as the flying Leia. Snoke was chopped in two like a marshmallow-pointless to the story. Not even curious where the story goes after this. Star Wars-please get another director-this was very disappointing.
